Dungeon Entrance.description: You are at the dungeon entrance and have to delve into the dungeon.

Strange Room.description: It is empty with nothing of note inside, you can have a little breather here.

Red Room.description: A horrible demon lunges at you!

Ominous Room.description: You feel an ominous tingling in your bones.

Howling Room.description: A wolf attacks you as its friends howl in unison!

Boney Room.description: A skeleton with dried flesh hanging off its bones prepares to take a swing at you!

Room of Webs.description: Your spidey senses start tingling just before a massive spider jumps at you!

Suspicious Room.description: The floor and walls of the room are covered in gnarly traps.

Crawling Room.description: The walls pulse and skitter - you're not alone in here.

Echoing Room.description: A low hum invades your thoughts before the leech shows itself.

Smoldering Room.description: Ash hangs in the air. Something burning is waiting.

Watchful Room.description: You sense you're being watched, and then the arrows fly.

Sulfurous Room.description: A wave of heat hits you, the dragonling snarls from the shadows.

Splintered Room.description: Broken logs and rotting wood litter the ground. Then you hear the axe.

Whispering Room.description: Low chanting echoes around you as the cultist steps forward.

Stale Room.description: The air is dead. Then the corpse moves.

Mythical Shop.description: An eerie glow lights up the chamber. Shelves of enchanted items line the walls, and a cloaked vendor watches you silently.
